title: After the Villain Lies Low, the Heroines Panic
author: Unknown
synopsis:
Lin Yuan transmigrated into a cultivation novel as the villain—a top-tier young master with the most powerful family background imaginable.

His grandfather is a legendary War God. His parents hold supreme power. His sisters command empires of business and formations.

The original host? A hopeless simp who wasted this god-tier starting hand chasing after Li Xuan'er, only to become a stepping stone for the protagonist Ye Xuan.

But Lin Yuan isn't about to repeat those mistakes. With his new "Divine Lie-Flat System" rewarding him for doing nothing, he'll cultivate to the peak while lounging by the pool—and watch as the heroines who once ignored him suddenly can't figure out why they're so drawn to this man who simply... doesn't care.

Meanwhile, the "Child of Destiny" Ye Xuan finds his carefully laid plans crumbling. Without Lin Yuan playing the fool, where will his resources come from? And why does that lazy young master seem to grow stronger every time he takes a nap?
